New Year's resolutions can be hard to keep, but Spring is a chance for a fresh start. 

Here are 3 key things you can learn from what the leading digital businesses do well:

1. Get clarity on the problem you are solving - understand the value your offering delivers to your customer
2. Focus on designing your customer experience to delight
3. Use data to refine your strategy

column2: Growing a brand is about more than just great products. After years of working in the beauty industry, Karen Young, Founder and CEO of Oui the People, felt that there were major gaps in inclusivity and sustainability. In 2015, Young set out to redesign the shaving experience for women and non-binary people through the launch of OUI came the mission ‚Äúreconstitution of beauty‚Äù OUI is a story of identifying your customers and building your business around their needs and hopes and individual stories.

column2: Every business owner has one overriding, often irrational fear: What if all of my customers disappear? Well, Roberto Ortiz and Jerry Shen were faced with this pandemic disruption like many other businesses early last year. The dynamic duo, and co-founder Tiger, decided to pivot to what is now ‚Äì Welcome, a high-end virtual event platform. They went on to secure a $12M Series A from with Kleiner Perkins, Kapor Captial, WIN (Webb Investment Network), Y Combinator, and others. Read on: https://bit.ly/3tqu5f3
